name: Floaty Pop
description:
You’ve seen the bubbles spinning, you’ve seen the bubbles falling. But you haven’t seen the bubbles floating!

Pop and float your way to victory in this fun and unique physics based match-3 bubble shooter game.

Explore dozens of levels of puzzling physics based fun, and enjoy amazing bombs and chain reactions inspired by such classics as Candy Crush and Bubble Cloud Planet.

Brilliant HD-graphics and smooth gameplay.

---

Support: https://valasmedia.com/support

Privacy Notice: https://valasmedia.com/privacy

Please note: This game is free to play and download but some optional in-game items will require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings. Also, under our Terms of Service and Privacy Notice, you must be at least 13 years of age to play or download this game.
